title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points are earned for f'(x)

2 points are earned for g'(x)

f ′ (x)=3 4+ (3x) 2 g ′ (x)= f ′ (sinx)⋅cosx         =3 4+ (3sinx) 2 ⋅cosx MathType@MTEF@5@5@@67B9@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for g(π) or g'(π)

1 point is earned for the tangent line equation

g(π) = 0, g'(π) = -6

Tangent line: y = -6(x - π)
descriptions:

g(π) = 0, g'(π) = -6

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned if sets g'(x) = 0

1 point is earned if justifies maximum at π 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaacqaHapaCaeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@387E@

For 0 < x < π, g'(x) = 0 only at x = π 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+=feaagCart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLnhiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=xfr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaSaaaeaacqaHapaCaeaacaaIYaaaaaaa@387E@ .

g(0) = g(π) = 0

g( π 2 )= ∫ 0 3 4+ t 2 dt>0 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@46CD@

The maximum value of g on [0, π] is ∫ 0 3 4+ t 2 dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3F07@ .
